full_text:
Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
From
To Lee Plourde
Date 2019/08/10 19:43
Subject: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Thanks, I figured I better just make sure (but I didnt think you were). I couldn't reach bosses. They will probably just reply thanks for awareness later.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: Lee Plourde @bop.gov
Date: 8/10/19 7:22 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
>>> "Lee Plourde" 08/10/2019 19:22 >>>
Haven't and will not.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From @bop.gov
Date: 8/10/19 7:19 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: @bop.gov, Lee Plourde @bop.gov, NYM/Exec Assistant~ @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
>>>  08/10/2019 19:19 >>>
Do not reply to the reporter.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: NYM/Exec Assistant~ @bop.gov
Date: 8/10/19 6:51 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: @bop.aov> @bop.aov>
Page 4936
DOJ-OGR-00024385

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing a potential leak in a hospital regarding Epstein's death. The emails are redacted, with some information obscured. The document is from the Department of Justice (DOJ) and has a document number (DOJ-OGR-00024385).
